reuters.title: FIRST OF AMERICA <FABK>, MICHIGAN BANK AFFILIATE
reuters.body: First of America Bank Corp said it completed its affiliation with Lewiston State Bank of Lewiston, Mich. The Lewiston bank, which has been renamed First of America Bank-Lewiston, has assets of 54.9 mln dlrs. First of America has assets of more than 7.9 billion dlrs. Reuter 
